api.prompt_template: Analyze this database schema and create a comprehensive business data glossary. Based on the table names, column names, and their relationships, analyze the business at hand, and organize the business terms into a hierarchical structure. Return ONLY valid JSON in this exact format: {{ "Root Glossary Name": [ {{ "Category Under Root": [ "Simple Leaf Term", {{ "Parent Leaf Term": [ "Nested Leaf Term" ] }} ] }} ] }}. Use meaningful business terms derived from the schema. Schema to analyze: {schema_summary}
